title: â“ What is Flexify?
content: Flexify is an open source cross browser add-on! It provides stunning accessibility features and functionality for people with disabilities. Enjoy using Flexify and have a unique internet experience with a click of a button!

title: â™¿ What disabilities does the extension cater to?
content: This accessibility extension is designed to cater to a range of disabilities, including but not limited to visual impairments, blindness, and cognitive impairments.

title: ğŸ’¡ What features does the tool offer?
content: The accessibility tool extension offers a range of features that are customizable to individual needs. Some of these features include text-to-speech, high-contrast mode, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatibility.

title: ğŸ†“ Is the extension free to use?
content: Yes, Flexify is an open source extension that is free to use and can be downloaded from the web store of your preferred web browser.

title: ğŸŒ What platforms are supported by Flexify?
content: Flexify is cross browser extension. It is also planned to be available on Android, iOS.

title: ğŸ› Who can I contact if I encounter any issues?
content: If you encounter any issues while using the extension, you can file a ticket on our Github Repo. Issue details can be found there.
